# prepare_comics_db_to_see_collection
    
```{r function-prepare_comics_db_to_see_collection}
#' Prepare comics database to see collection
#' @return a comics database with only the columns needed to see the collection
#' @rdname fct_mod_130
#' @importFrom dplyr select mutate
#' @export
prepare_comics_db_to_see_collection <- function(comics_db) {
  db <- comics_db |>
    select(
      titre,
      date_publication,
      nb_pages,
      editeur,
      possede,
      note,
      type_publication,
      statut,
      lien_cover,
      ISBN
    ) |>
    mutate(
      lien_cover = paste0(
        "<a href='",
        lien_cover,
        "' target=\"_blank\">",
        "Couverture",
        "</a>"
      )
    )
}
```
